BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 1 - Battle It In
BoardLevelInfo.Description: Build your base in toward the center
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Get to the center first

BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 2 - Battle It Out
BoardLevelInfo.Description: Build your base out toward the corners
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Get to any corner first

BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 3 - Multi-Base (LongPlay)
BoardLevelInfo.Description: A long game. Use strategy to trap your opponent's growth
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Have the most points when the board is full

BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 4 - Sticky Blocks (LongPlay, Sticky)
BoardLevelInfo.Description: A long game where it's hard to move (especially for the AI)
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Have the most points when the board is full

BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 5 - The Cave (LongPlay)
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Have the most points when the board is full

BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 6 - The Sticky Cave (LongPlay, Sticky)
BoardLevelInfo.Description: Mind your strategy and the sticky blocks!
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Have the most points when the board is full

BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 7 - Dead End (QuickPlay)
BoardLevelInfo.Description: A quick game. Build to the left
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Get to the left first

BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 8 - Gauntlet (QuickPlay)
BoardLevelInfo.Description: A quick game. Build left to right
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Get to the right first

BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 9 -The X (QuickPlay)
BoardLevelInfo.Description: A quick game. Build toward the center
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Get to the center first

BoardLevelInfo.Name: Level 10 - Double Diamond (QuickPlay)
BoardLevelInfo.Description: A quick game. Build toward the bottom
BoardLevelInfo.Description2: -WIN RULES- Get to the bottom first
